GUYS GUYS GUYS !!!

This WORKS !
I've have the Globe v. of L4D2 and here's what I did -

1) Download and extract the entire content of the zip-file 
2) Go to the "Sound" folder where there is a "Globe Converter" .. Just double-click on it and wait until it's done.. Should take 10 minutes max.
3) Download this torrent and extract at the main L4D folder
4) This step is IMPORTANT. Once ur done with that, DO NOT FORGET the reg files.. Run either one which suits you.
5) Just PLAY !! :D

It fixes all the bugs.. Every single one !!
And no need to change the date.. I have an XP and meet the requirements easily.

There is however, one glitch.. Every time u quit, it resets ur achievements. That's no big deal but I think it doesn't erase em in the RAZOR v. 

Have fun !!

If you get an error saying "MODE NOT SUPPORTED" because your monitor or TV does not support the Games Default Resolution, then here is the fix:

All you have to do is, go to your shortcut on the desktop, right click go to properties. There should be text "Target" and next to it a line of coding like this "C:\Program Files\Left 4 Dead 2\left4dead2.exe" 

Change "C:\Program Files\Left 4 Dead 2\left4dead2.exe" to "C:\Program Files\Left 4 Dead 2\left4dead2.exe" -w 1024 -h 768 or what ever your Monitor or TV Supports.

That should force it to start up with those dimensions. Also if you wanna skip the video in the beginning, type -novid after -h 768
